name: 蘇春𤂌
objective: On satisfactory completion of this subject, students will be able to: (i) explain the fundamental aspects of sensors and transducers, (ii) describe how and why a sensor is designed, (iii) discuss the signal conditioning circuit design, (iv) explain the mechanical design and packaging of sensors, and factors which influence failure, (v) describe the fabrication of sensors, and (v) apply the principle of sensors and transducers to engineering design problems, e.g., the selection and application of sensors.
